name: AutocompleteRoot
description:
Groups all parts of the autocomplete.
Doesn't render its own HTML element.

name.description: Identifies the field when a form is submitted.

defaultOpen.description:
Whether the combobox popup is initially open.

To render a controlled combobox popup, use the `open` prop instead.

open.description: Whether the combobox popup is currently open.

onOpenChange.type: ((open: boolean, event: Event | undefined, reason: Combobox.Root.OpenChangeReason | undefined) => void)
onOpenChange.description: Event handler called when the combobox popup is opened or closed.
onOpenChange.detailedType:
| ((
    open: boolean,
    event: Event | undefined,
    reason: Combobox.Root.OpenChangeReason | undefined,
  ) => void)
| undefined

actionsRef.description:
A ref to imperative actions.
- `unmount`: When specified, the combobox will not be unmounted when closed.
Instead, the `unmount` function must be called to unmount the combobox manually.
Useful when the combobox's animation is controlled by an external library.

cols.description: The number of columns the items are rendered in grid layout.

defaultInputValue.description: The uncontrolled input value when initially rendered.

filter.type: ((item: GroupItem | Item, query: string, itemToString: ((item: GroupItem | Item) => string) | undefined) => boolean)
filter.description:
Filter function used to match items vs input query.
The `itemToString` function is provided to help convert items to strings for comparison.
filter.detailedType:
| ((
    item: GroupItem | Item,
    query: string,
    itemToString:
      | ((item: GroupItem | Item) => string)
      | undefined,
  ) => boolean)
| undefined

inputValue.description: The input value of the combobox.

itemToString.description: Function to convert an item to a string for display in the combobox.

itemToValue.description: Function to convert an item to its value for form submission.

items.description:
The items to be displayed in the combobox.
Can be either a flat array of items or an array of groups with items.

onInputValueChange.type: ((value: string, event: Event | undefined, reason: string | undefined) => void)
onInputValueChange.description: Callback fired when the input value of the combobox changes.
onInputValueChange.detailedType:
| ((
    value: string,
    event: Event | undefined,
    reason: string | undefined,
  ) => void)
| undefined

onItemHighlighted.type: ((value: GroupItem | Item | undefined, data: { type: 'keyboard' | 'pointer', index: number }) => void)
onItemHighlighted.description:
Callback fired when the user navigates the list and highlights an item.
Passes the item's `value` or `undefined` when no item is highlighted.
onItemHighlighted.detailedType:
| ((
    value: GroupItem | Item | undefined,
    data: { type: 'keyboard' | 'pointer'; index: number },
  ) => void)
| undefined

onOpenChangeComplete.description: Event handler called after any animations complete when the combobox popup is opened or closed.

openOnInputClick.description: Whether the combobox popup opens when clicking the input.

virtualized.description: Whether the combobox items are virtualized.

disabled.description: Whether the component should ignore user interaction.

readOnly.description: Whether the user should be unable to choose a different option from the combobox popup.

required.description: Whether the user must choose a value before submitting a form.

inputRef.description: A ref to the hidden input element used for form submission.
